content: I think the Google Nest Mini is great. It has modest improvements compared to previous models.

The sound quality is noteworthy, especially for the size. Vocals are clear and the device is great overall.
I upgraded four of my old Google Home Minis to the new Nest Mini and they are all working perfectly.
The sound yield was fairly noteworthy for the Google Nest Mini speaker and the vocals were clear.
I like that the Google Nest Mini will play Amazon Music. This feature makes it a superior choice.

One thing I like about the Google Nest Mini is that it has improved a lot compared to previous versions.

After a month of use, I can recommend the Google Nest Mini as a great smart speaker option.
